trans-unit.source: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.
The formatting options object, as defined by the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions" /> object.
The input value to be converted.
Returns the value provided by a user for a control that is being validated.

<see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string and the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.ConvertEmptyStringToNull" /> property of <paramref name="formattingOptions" /> is <see langword="true" />; <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or an empty string and matches the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions.NullDisplayText" /> property of <paramref name="formattingOptions" />; otherwise, the unchanged value of <paramref name="value" />.
For information about formatting options, see the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions> type overview.
trans-unit.target: 서식 옵션에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오.는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions> 개요를 입력 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.ConvertEditedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.ConvertEditedValue%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 날짜 및 시간 데이터를 허용 하도록 구성 된 필드 서식 파일에서 사용자 입력을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`.
trans-unit.target: DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs 또는 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb 파일에는 메서드는 빈 문자열을 변환 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data bound control.
Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

In controls that extend <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 확장 하는 컨트롤에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> 선택 영역을 지 원하는 페이징 및 정렬,이 메서드를 호출 하면 선택 된 행이 표시 되지 않는 경우에 선택 영역을 유지 하도록 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 사용자가 행을 선택 하 고 다음 페이지 링크를 다른 페이지 또는 사용자 데이터를 정렬 하는 경우 선택 된 행 선택 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는, 사용자 페이지 하거나 정렬 하는 경우 선택 항목이 손실 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A> method calls <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.EnablePersistedSelection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager.RegisterControl%2A> 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.EnablePersistedSelection%2A>를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data source object.
Expands dynamic filters into <see langword="Where" /> parameters that are usable by the data source.

This method expands the values of the current instances of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControlParameter> and <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter> controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 확장의 현재 인스턴스 값의 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControlParameter> 및 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter> 에 제어 `Where` 쿼리 데이터 원본에서 사용할 수 있는 매개 변수.

trans-unit.source: A control inside the hierarchy of a data-bound control whose containing control you want to find.
Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.
The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.
The following example shows how to find the containing data source control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제를 포함 하는 데이터 소스 컨트롤을 찾는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 동적 데이터 페이지 서식 파일은 AdventureWorksLT 데이터베이스의 ProductDescription 테이블에 대 한 사용자 지정 표시를 제공 하려면 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 폴더에 복사 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindDataSourceControl%2A> method is called to find the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Insert.aspx 파일 태그를 추가 하려면 변경 되는 `OnDataBound` 이라는 이벤트 처리기 `DetailsView1_DataBound`는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindDataSourceControl%2A> 메서드는 데이터 소스 컨트롤을 찾기 위해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The containing control.
The name of the column.
Returns the field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.
The field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.
The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에 지정된 된 열 이름에 대 한 텍스트 상자 컨트롤을 찾는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 동적 데이터 페이지 서식 파일은 AdventureWorksLT 데이터베이스의 ProductDescription 테이블에 대 한 사용자 지정 표시를 제공 하려면 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 폴더에 복사 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindDataSourceControl%2A> method is called to find a text box control.
trans-unit.target: Insert.aspx 파일 태그를 추가 하려면 변경 되는 `OnDataBound` 이라는 이벤트 처리기 `DetailsView1_DataBound`는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindDataSourceControl%2A> 메서드를 호출 하는 텍스트 상자 컨트롤을 찾습니다.

trans-unit.source: The current control.
Returns the metatable object for the containing data control.
The metatable object for the containing data control.
The following example shows how to find the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> object for a control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 찾는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> 컨트롤에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 동적 데이터 페이지 서식 파일은 AdventureWorksLT 데이터베이스의 ProductDescription 테이블에 대 한 사용자 지정 표시를 제공 하려면 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 폴더에 복사 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindMetaTable%2A> method is called to find the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> object.
trans-unit.target: Insert.aspx 파일 태그를 추가 하려면 변경 되는 `OnDataBound` 이라는 이벤트 처리기 `DetailsView1_DataBound`는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FindMetaTable%2A> 메서드 찾기 위해 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions" /> instance to use.
The field value to format.
Formats the specified field value by using the specified formatting options.
The field value that has been formatted by using the specified formatting options.

The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FormatEditValue%2A> method is like the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FormatValue%2A> method, but it is used when the field is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FormatEditValue%2A> 방법은 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.FormatValue%2A> 메서드, 하지만 필드가 편집 모드에 있을 때 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions" /> instance to use.
The field value to format.
Formats the specified field value by using the specified formatting options.
The field value that has been formatted by using the specified formatting options.
Gets the default values.
The data source for which to get the default values.
Gets the collection of the default values for the specified data source.
The collection of default values that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> object.
The collection of default values is set by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 기본값의 컬렉션을 사용 하 여 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The data control for which to get the default values.
Gets the collection of the default values for the specified data control.
The collection of default values that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object.
The collection of default values is set by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 기본값의 컬렉션을 사용 하 여 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The column to get the enumeration type for.
Gets the type of the enumeration that represents the column.
The type of the enumeration that represents the column if the underlying type is an enumeration; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.

The column represents an enumeration if the underlying type is an enumeration or if the column is annotated in the entity partial class with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.EnumDataTypeAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 기본 형식은 열거형이 또는 열 사용 하 여 엔터티 partial 클래스에 주석을 처리 하는 경우 열 열거형을 나타내면는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.EnumDataTypeAttribute> 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets metadata for a table.
The data source object for which to get the table metadata.
Gets the metadata for a table in the specified data source object.
The table metadata associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> object.
The table metadata was set by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 테이블 메타 데이터를 사용 하 여 설정한는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The data control for which to get the table metadata.
Gets the table metadata for the specified data control.
The table metadata that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object.
The table metadata was set by using the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 테이블 메타 데이터를 사용 하 여 설정한는 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions.SetMetaTable%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions.EnableDynamicData%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The data source control.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable" /> object that is associated with the specified data source control.
The table that is associated with the specified data source control.
The <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource.EntitySetName" /> property of <paramref name="dataSource" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource.ContextType" /> property of <paramref name="dataSource" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The type of the entities that are returned by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본에 의해 반환 되는 엔터티 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The LINQ data source to load the foreign keys from.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions" /> value of a LINQ-to-SQL data source to force all the foreign-key entities to be loaded.
The LINQ data source to load the foreign keys from.
The type of the entities that are returned by the data source.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions" /> value of a LINQ-to-SQL data source to force all the foreign-key entities to be loaded.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataLoadOptions?displayProperty=nameWithType> 클래스 개요입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object that contains the table.
The table metadata.
Sets the table metadata for the specified data control.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object that contains the table.
The table metadata.
The default value mapping.
Sets the table metadata and default value mapping for the specified data control.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object that contains the table.
The table metadata.
The default value mapping.
Sets the table metadata and default value mapping for the specified data control.
Determines whether table metadata is available.
The data source that contains the table.
When this method returns, contains the table metadata.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Determines whether table metadata is available.
<see langword="true" /> if table metadata is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer" /> object that contains the table.
When this method returns, contains the table metadata.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Determines whether table metadata is available.
<see langword="true" /> if table metadata is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
